Heartpiercer Shade ARC
BR BR 2 Creature - Shade Archer Creature 2/2
2 BR: Create an Arrow token and attach it to this creature. (It’s an Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0. When equipped creature attacks, sacrifice this artifact at the end of combat” and equip {1}.) Sacrifice an equipment attached to this creature: Deal 1 damage to any target player. Activate only as a sorcery.
